name: Bulsatcom File Generator
description: Generates M3U and EPG files from Bulsatcom IPTV service with comprehensive configuration options.
overview: This plugin automatically generates M3U playlist and XMLTV EPG files from Bulsatcom IPTV service. Features include credential validation, configurable refresh intervals, content filtering, error handling, and a modern configuration interface.

versions.changelog: AUTO REFRESH: Plugin now automatically triggers 'Refresh Guide' after generating new M3U/EPG files, ensuring Jellyfin immediately reloads updated channel URLs and tokens without manual intervention.
